mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (order_id, user_id, created_time, status, price, payment_method, address_id, pay_time, completed_time, shop_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{user_id}, #{created_time}, #{status}, #{price}, #{payment_method}, #{address_id}, #{pay_time}, #{completed_time}, #{shop_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity})
